item.title: How to Alert
item.description: Define SLI’s and SLO’s We have to define what is successful operation of the service. Burger World example: Burger World has 3 main objectives: Serve customer orders at drive through in 3min or less. Serve customer orders at walk up counter in 5min or less. Less than 1% of orders result in corrective action. First assume that all other operations are working as designed, we only monitor and alert on deviations from the primary objectives.

item.title: MBA Monterey
item.description: Issues after upgrading my 2020 Macbook Air (m1) to macOS Monterey: Battery life went to shit, have to enable low power mode on battery. Bitwig and SoundCraft MTK 12 mixer no longer cooperate. Issue #1 I don’t have a whole lot of evidence to support but it did feel like the battery life on my brand new Macbook Air M1 had gotten a lot worse after the upgrade to Monterey (12.
